description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Modern Pirate Hunter: Ep 1 (Nash's Revenge) is a fast-paced sea combat game with a unique style of action and depth featuring intense dog-fights, a rich 3D world to explore, a multitude of weapons and upgrades, and a thrilling campaign.
description.short: Modern Pirate Hunter: Ep 1 (Nash's Revenge) is a fast-paced sea combat game with a unique style of action and depth featuring intense dog-fights, a rich 3D world to explore, a multitude of weapons and upgrades, and a thrilling campaign.
